name: Infinity Battle (Fetis)
description:
You stuck in the loop of gladiator tournament and the only way to escape is to kill the final gladiator. Also you get gold for dealing damage and for some strange reason these gold are not reset in  the beginning of the loop. You can spend your gold on upgrades. Good luck!

Controls:
WASD - movement
Left mouse button - attack

Credits:
Fetis - programmer (Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2ACJWFNUptRHbYryed8phQ)
VipRip - 3D Artist
$тепан Cowbelлович - Sound Designer
PotterPuffs - Concept Artist (itch.io: https://itch.io/profile/potterpuffs)
